meanings.definition: A musical instrument traditionally used by Indigenous Australians.
meanings.sent1: The didgeridoos were played at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent2: I heard the sound of didgeridoos echoing through the outback.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo tried to play the didgeridoos but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The didgeridoos hummed like ancient spirits in the night.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic pulse of the didgeridoos filled the air with magic.

meanings.sent1: There were many didgeridoos displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The musicians each played their didgeridoos in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The didgeridoos lined up in a row looked like a colorful fence.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the deep resonance of the didgeridoos.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the didgeridoos transported me to the Australian bush.
